Describe your contributions below.

The dataset contains 3 csv files, which are named inventory, fulfilment, orders and shipment. The tables are joined on Product Name columns.
The 3 csv files are combined into one and a pandas dataframe "merged_df" is created. The project file is named "DW_SAMPLE1.ipynb"
